content.raw: If there is no error threshold required, then there is almost no point in bothering with qual1.  The qual1 score only matters if you tie for the last spot in qual2.  Since the qual2 score is a time, the chances of a tie are low.  The chances that your entry has an exact tie for the last qualifying slot are very very low.  So you would be better to forget qual1 entirely and spend the time doing a better job on qual2.

So you would be better to forget qual1 entirely and spend the time doing a better job on qual2.
